QuestData.Title: Speak with the Dead
QuestData.Description: So many souls perished beneath the waves. Too many sacrificed for her ambition.$b$bIt is strange that the spirits here have not departed. I wonder if they even know they are dead?$b$bStill, their knowledge might be useful to us. If you could question the spirits, they might be able to point us in the right direction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Question the spirits in the Highborne Estates to discover something useful.
